name: candv.candv
description: candv stands for Constants & Values. It is a little Python library which provides an easy way for creating complex constants.

name: candv.django-candv-choices
description: Use complex constants built with candv library instead of standard choices fields for Django models.

name: candv.django-rf-candv-choices
description: Support of django-candv-choices for django-rest-framework.

name: verboselib
description: A little L10N framework for Python libraries and applications.

name: logging.tx-logging
description: A tiny Python library which extends Twisted logging facilities

name: logging.isotopic-logging
description: A Python library which allows to mark and trace events in log alike isotopic labeling.

name: il2fb.demo.bug-reporter
description: Creates bug issues on GitHub automatically when an exception occurs. Used by demo pages of libraries.

name: il2fb.demo.demo-services
description: Services used for demonstration of usage of libraries created by IL2HorusTeam.

name: il2fb.il2fb-commons
description: Common helpers and data structures for projects related to IL-2 Forgotten Battles.

name: il2fb.il2fb-difficulty
description: Parser and emitter of difficulty settings of IL-2 Forgotten Battles.

name: il2fb.parsers.il2fb-mission-parser
description: A Python library for parsing mission file of IL-2 Forgotten Battles. It produces detailed information about mission.

name: il2fb.demo.il2fb-mission-parser-demo
description: Demo application for il2fb-mission-parser library.

name: il2fb.parsers.il2fb-events-parser
description: Parses events from log file produced by IL-2 FB Dedicated Server

name: il2fb.demo.il2fb-events-parser-demo
description: Demo application of il2fb-events-parser library

name: il2fb.parsers.il2fb-console-parser
description: Parse output of IL-2 FB Dedicated Server console

name: il2fb.ds.il2fb-ds-config
description: Library for working with IL-2 FB Dedicated Server settings.

name: il2fb.ds.il2fb-ds-emulator
description: Emulates of IL-2 FB Dedicated Server to run tests very fast.

name: il2fb.ds.il2fb-ds-middleware
description: High-level wrapper of quite primitive API of IL-2 FB Dedicated Server.

name: il2fb.commander.minic
description: Minicommander for IL-2 FB Dedicated Server.

name: il2fb.il2fb-heightmap-creator
description: A distributed Python application with client-server architecture for making height maps of IL-2 FB locations.

name: il2fb.il2fb-navigator
description: Library for working with IL-2 FB locations online

name: il2fb.il2fb-fuselage
description: Core/skeleton for commanders of IL-2 FB Dedicated Server

name: il2fb.il2fb-gennadich-adapter
description: Python DB mappings for IL-2 Server Commander created by Gennadich Team.

name: il2fb.web-map-tools
description: Online application for working with IL-2 FB locations

name: il2fb.commander.il2ds-events-commander
description: A software system for staging online historical events on IL-2 FB Dedicated Server.
